sentences.en: Alimony may also be granted without a divorce, as between legally separated persons.
sentences.cn: 赡养费亦可付给并未离婚的双方中的一方, 如在合法分居时.
我支付的赡养费可抵税 吗 ?

sentences.en: He needed something to renew his energies and, not incidentally, a means of making his alimony and child-support payments.
sentences.cn: 他需要一些事情来恢复他的活力，并且并非偶然地需要一种能挣赡养费和孩子抚养费的方法。

sentences.en: He tells Maureen that even though he's now entitled to alimony, he doesn't want a nickel.
sentences.cn: 她说他们之间的性关系不协调, 他立刻说爱莉也是为了性的.

sentences.en: His ex - wife has upped the ante in her alimony suit against him.
sentences.cn: 他的 前妻 在诉讼中要求提高赡养费.

sentences.en: If a trial is necessary, the court has the authority to order one spouse to pay the other’s attorney fees in alimony, child support and child custody matters.
sentences.cn: 如果审判是必要的，法院有权判定双发有一方要为其配偶支付律师费，赡养费，子女抚养费和子女监护权问题。

sentences.en: If you still want money, then it isn't an alimony , it's severance pay.
sentences.cn: 如果你坚持要钱的话, 那也不是赡养费而是遣散费.

sentences.en: In case you should die and can't pay the alimony and legal fees.
sentences.cn: 不然万一你死了,你就付不了抚养费和其它法定费用了.

sentences.en: Mrs. Jones awarded $ 1000.00 monthly alimony by the court when she was divorced from her husband.
sentences.cn: 琼斯太太跟丈夫离婚后,根据法院判决她每月可得到一千美元的赡养费.

sentences.en: Plus there's all the obvious problems with humans - AIDS, alimony, etc - that I just wanted to avoid.
sentences.cn: 另外还有的所有突出问题,与人类艾滋病, 赡养费, 等 -,我只是想避免的.

sentences.en: Susan: Well, somebody did, because he sent me a text agreeing to keep paying me alimony.
sentences.cn: 苏珊: 嗯, 有人这么做了, 因为他发给我短信,同意继续付我赡养费.

sentences.en: You may have to pay alimony if the divorce goes through.
sentences.cn: 如果离婚了,你也必须给对方赡养费.

trans.tran_cn: （离婚或分居后在诉讼期间男方给女方的）赡养费，生活费
trans.tran_en: money that a court orders someone to pay regularly to their former wife or husband after their marriage has ended
